name: Witch Orb
description:
Description
Use the magic orbs to kill skeletons and gain points! but be careful, if you get hit by the orb then you'll
suffer the same fate as the skeletons. Hit the orb at any time to reflect it or when you see the star to split it!
Make sure to split them fast or they'll break after a few bounces!
Controls
Arrow keys, WASD, or Dpad to move
Ctrl, space bar, or A button to reflect
Esc, Back or select on controller to exit or if all else fails alt f4 works

Didn't have time to add a title screen or proper game over, so game just starts and resets when you run out of lives.

Graphics by Olivia Allin
Programming by Alex Allin
Sounds from Kenny assets https://www.kenney.nl/assets
